title: How to document web errors
summary: The JavaScript error reference on MDN Web Docs is a project to help web developers with errors occurring in the Developer Console. For this project, we need to write more error documentation on MDN Web Docs so that we can add more links to the tools where the messages are thrown. This article explains how to document the web errors.
pageTitle: How to document web errors - The MDN Web Docs project | MDN
